short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Block any Christmas related content seamlessly

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
OVERVIEW
Are you annoyed by all the ads trying to sell you more decorations? More stocking stuffers? More presents? We are too! 
So we created XmasBlocker. A simple web extension that will block all unwanted Holiday and Christmas ads for you - so you don't need to see them anymore.

HOW DOES IT WORK?
Download the extension and select if you want to block images, text, or both. 
Then decide if you want to blur the content or remove them altogether. 
And voila - the extension will do its magic. 

Hopefully, this will make browsing the internet a bit easier for you this Holiday season.

Made with ❤️ by those who love the holidays - but not all the commercial ads around it. 

GOT FEEDBACK? We'd love to hear it! 
Give us feedback if you like our extension OR if you'd like to add other content filters!
